EndpointConfiguration.description: The configuration for a given endpoint

properties.name: EndpointId
properties.description: Id of the endpoint. For Network/Application Load Balancer this value is the ARN.  For EIP, this value is the allocation ID.  For EC2 instances, this is the EC2 instance ID

type.description: Id of the endpoint. For Network/Application Load Balancer this value is the ARN.  For EIP, this value is the allocation ID.  For EC2 instances, this is the EC2 instance ID

properties.name: ClientIPPreservationEnabled
properties.description: true if client ip should be preserved

type.description: true if client ip should be preserved

properties.name: ListenerArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener

properties.name: EndpointGroupRegion
properties.description: The name of the AWS Region where the endpoint group is located

type.description: The name of the AWS Region where the endpoint group is located

properties.name: TrafficDialPercentage
properties.description: The percentage of traffic to sent to an AWS Region

type.description: The percentage of traffic to sent to an AWS Region

properties.name: HealthCheckPort
properties.description: The port that AWS Global Accelerator uses to check the health of endpoints in this endpoint group.

type.description: The port that AWS Global Accelerator uses to check the health of endpoints in this endpoint group.

properties.name: HealthCheckProtocol
properties.description: The protocol that AWS Global Accelerator uses to check the health of endpoints in this endpoint group.

type.description: The protocol that AWS Global Accelerator uses to check the health of endpoints in this endpoint group.

properties.name: HealthCheckIntervalSeconds
properties.description: The time in seconds between each health check for an endpoint. Must be a value of 10 or 30

type.description: The time in seconds between each health check for an endpoint. Must be a value of 10 or 30

properties.name: ThresholdCount
properties.description: The number of consecutive health checks required to set the state of the endpoint to unhealthy.

type.description: The number of consecutive health checks required to set the state of the endpoint to unhealthy.

properties.name: EndpointGroupArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint group

type.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint group
